8 using System;
9 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI;
10 
11 namespace ColorShapeLinks.Common.Session
12 {
16  public class Match
17  {
19  public readonly IThinkerPrototype thinkerWhite;
20 
22  public readonly IThinkerPrototype thinkerRed;
23 
34  public IThinkerPrototype this[PColor color] =>
35  color == PColor.White ? thinkerWhite
36  : color == PColor.Red ? thinkerRed
37  : throw new InvalidOperationException(
38  $"Invalid thinker color");
39 
42  public Match Swapped => new Match(thinkerRed, thinkerWhite);
43 
47  public Match(
48  IThinkerPrototype thinkerWhite, IThinkerPrototype thinkerRed)
49  {
50  // Keep references to thinkers
51  this.thinkerWhite = thinkerWhite;
52  this.thinkerRed = thinkerRed;
53  }
54 
57  public override string ToString() =>
58  $"{thinkerWhite.ThinkerName} vs {thinkerRed.ThinkerName}";
59  }
60 }
